game.title: The Quest for the Lost Artifact
game.description: The Ancient Relic, said to possess mystical powers, was stolen from the Temple by an unknown thief. It is believed to be hidden within a series of ancient ruins scattered across the land. Uncover its location and return it to the Council of Elders.

task.description: Gaius, a wise seer, holds the key to deciphering the clues about the Relic's whereabouts. Seek him out in the Temple Ruins of Avalon.

task.objective: Discover the Map to the First Ruin
task.description: The map will guide you to the first hidden ruin. It's said to be guarded by a cryptic riddle within the Council's archives.
